heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
ayahuascaInfoTitle: A Journey to the Heart of Consciousness
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred medicine from the Amazon, prepared from the mixture of two plants: the Banisteriopsis caapi vine and the leaves of the Psychotria viridis shrub. Used for centuries by indigenous peoples, it is a powerful tool for physical, emotional, and spiritual healing, opening the doors to deep introspection and connection with the universe.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Ayahuasca induces expanded states of consciousness, allowing you to access memories, emotions, and subconscious patterns. It acts as a mirror of the soul, revealing what needs to be healed and released. Guided by our facilitators, the journey takes you through a deep cleansing, helping you to let go of old wounds and rediscover your true essence.
spiritualMasterDescription: More than a substance, Ayahuasca is considered a spiritual teacher that teaches through visions, feelings, and revelations. Each ceremony is a unique conversation with this ancestral wisdom, offering personalized lessons for your life path and personal growth.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Gain a new perspective on your life, relationships, and purpose. Many participants find answers to deep questions and a renewed sense of direction.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release deep-seated traumas, fears, and emotional blockages. Ayahuasca helps you process and heal past wounds, allowing you to live with greater peace and freedom.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Experience a deep connection with yourself, with others, and with the universe. Feel the unity of all existence and rediscover your place in the cosmos.
groupCeremonyDescription: Share the healing energy in a circle of trust. Group ceremonies enhance the experience through connection and mutual support, creating a collective energy field that holds each participant in their journey.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and personalized experience, we offer private ceremonies. A space for deep introspection where you will receive the exclusive attention of our guides, completely tailored to your needs and process.
guidesPageSubtitle: Experienced and compassionate facilitators dedicated to your healing journey.
guide_desc_wilson: Spiritual guide with a deep connection to Amazonian traditions. Trained in the Peruvian Amazon, Wilson brings an ancestral understanding of Ayahuasca and its healing power. His experience facilitates a safe and trustworthy space for personal exploration.
guide_desc_jacob: Spiritual master trained in the Peruvian Amazon, where he learned the sacred use of ancestral medicine directly from healers. With a serene and profound presence, he guides ceremonies at Casa Trinitos (Guanacaste), where he accompanies transformation processes.
guide_desc_harley: Specialist in medical care and first aid, with experience in guided meditations and therapeutic massages. Her calm and professional presence ensures a safe environment throughout the ceremony, providing confidence and support to both the team and the participants.
guide_desc_johanna: Guardian of the medicine trained in the Peruvian Amazon. Providing ceremonies in Colombia and Costa Rica, her presence brings security, support, and balance between the physical and spiritual, upholding the ceremonial space with firmness, care, and a deep connection to female healing.
exploreMedicineDescription: Discover the history and transformative power of Ayahuasca.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the facilitators who will accompany you on your journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Find all the necessary information to prepare for your ceremony.
contactCommunityText: Join our community and stay up to date with our upcoming events and retreats. Follow us on our social networks or write to us directly for more information.

backupSubtitle: Manage application data backups and restores.
exportDataDescription: Create a backup of all database collections into a single JSON file.
importDataDescription: Restore the database from a JSON file. This action will overwrite existing data.
importWarningDescription: You are about to overwrite ALL current database data with the contents of the file. This action is irreversible. An automatic backup will be created before importing.
importSuccessDescription: The data has been restored from the file.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup from the last import has been detected. If something went wrong, you can restore the data to the state before the import.
rollbackWarningDescription: Are you sure you want to revert the data to the state before the last import? This action is irreversible.
rollbackSuccessDescription: The data has been restored to the pre-import backup.

analyticsDescription: Visualize which sections of the website receive the most interaction.

assignCeremonyDescriptionAdmin: Select the ceremonies this user will be assigned to.
myCeremoniesSubtitle: Here you can see the ceremonies you have been assigned to.
noAssignedCeremoniesTitle: You have no assigned ceremonies yet
noAssignedCeremoniesDescription: Explore our ceremonies and complete your registration to be assigned to one.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Preparation is key to a deep and transformative experience. Follow this guide to align your body, mind, and spirit.
preparationProcessDescription: You register and fill out the medical questionnaire to ensure the experience is safe for you.
ceremonyProcessDescription: You participate in the sacred ritual, guided by our expert facilitators in a safe and supportive environment.
experienceProcessDescription: You navigate your inner world, release emotions, and receive the insights the medicine has for you.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we support you so you can apply the lessons learned in your daily life and continue your growth.
dietSubtitle: A clean diet prepares your body and sharpens your sensitivity. We recommend following it for at least 3-5 days before the ceremony.
allowedFoodsList: • Fresh fruits and vegetables • Whole grains (rice, quinoa) • Legumes and lentils • Water, herbal teas
prohibitedFoodsList: • Red and processed meats • Dairy and fermented foods • Refined sugars and spicy foods • Alcohol, caffeine, and other drugs
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your mental state and intentions are fundamental to the journey.
meditationDescription: Practice meditation to calm the mind and open yourself to the experience.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you seek to heal or understand. Set a clear intention.
reflectionDescription: Write in a journal your thoughts and feelings before the ceremony.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can be an intense emotional journey. Prepare to face and release repressed emotions like sadness, anger, or fear. Trust the process and the wisdom of the medicine to guide you. Allow yourself to be vulnerable in a safe and contained space. Emotional release is a fundamental part of the deep healing that Ayahuasca offers.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
comfortItemsList: • Comfortable and warm clothing (in layers) • Blanket and pillow (optional) • Personal water bottle • Personal object or amulet (optional)
essentialsList: • Open mind and heart • Clear intentions • Respect for the process • Trust in the guides
